trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The data item that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados que é associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> for a data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> para um item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> for <paramref name="item" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> para <paramref name="item" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tree" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tree" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> elements, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> ou <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> associado com esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer" /> estiver vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "TreeView".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "TreeView".

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" />, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> ou <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o provedor de Automação da Interface do Usuário permite que mais de um elemento filho seja selecionado simultaneamente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a seleção múltipla é permitida. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um provedor de Automação da Interface do Usuário para cada elemento filho selecionado.

trans-unit.source: A collection of UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de provedores de Automação da Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o provedor de Automação da Interface do Usuário exige que, pelo menos, um elemento filho seja selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if selection is required; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a seleção é obrigatória. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.
